Flamingo Rd., Las Vegas, NV, 89147', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 37', 'OR Text', '37', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Your Modern Getaway in Spring Valley', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 759 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Find your escape at FireSkye, a fully modernized apartment community now leasing upscale 1, 2 and 3 bedroom residences.', 'Nestled in Spring Valley within sight of Red Rock Canyon, we invite you to experience a higher level of luxury with all-new amenity upgrades and reimagined social spaces to make you feel at home.', 'Soak up the sun by the pool, chill out in a private cabana, and live every day like you’re on vacation.', 'When it’s time to head back to your apartment, you’ll be greeted by thoughtfully designed living that instantly feels like your own personal oasis.', 'RENOS - COMING SOON!', 'Features', '- Heating', '- Air Conditioning', '- Refrigerator', '- Microwave', '- Ice Maker', '- Double Vanities', '- Eat-in Kitchen', '- Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '- Storage Units', '- Balcony', '- Fireplace', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Tile Floors', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Kitchen', '- Wi-Fi', '- Range', '- In Unit Washer & Dryer', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Center', '- Property Manager on Site', '- 24 Hour Availability', '- Business Center', '- Pool', '- Courtyard', '- Cabana', '- Spa', '- Grill', '- Lounge', 'Office Hours', 'Monday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday: 11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'One-time pet fee: $350', 'Pet deposit fee min: $150', 'Pet monthly rent min: $35', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'CYY4eMTXI98d']
